scripts.preinstall:
apt-get update -y && apt-get install -y \
      libasound2 libatk1.0-0 libatk-bridge2.0-0 libcups2 libdbus-1-3 \
      libgdk-pixbuf2.0-0 libnspr4 libnss3 libx11-xcb1 libxcomposite1 \
      libxdamage1 libxrandr2 libgbm1 xdg-utils fonts-liberation \
      --no-install-recommends
scripts.postinstall: npx puppeteer browsers install chrome && npx puppeteer browsers list && echo "âœ… Puppeteer download finished"
